question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. microwave
B. white handbag
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white handbag is on the kitchen counter in the foreground, while the microwave is mounted on the wall in the background, making the handbag clearly closer.
